title: Rock Traitor

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > Use the abilities of the role you get.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> You will be given a random Rock role. That is your role, but you win with the Town.

> You will not gain permanent defense, even if your role grants that.

> You will not get access to the factional chat, you will also not get access to the factional kill.

> You will not get roles which can only target/effect members of the Rocks.

desc:
Post 1550
*"Tell us who the Rocks are!"*
*"I don't remember, but don't worry, I have a very useful ability for the town!"*
*"...What is it..."*
*"I can rally all the Rocks!"*
*"You can rally the Rocks, but you don't remember who they are. These traitors are useless."*
